title: Shortcuts
text: Adding a shortcut does not move a file's location, but only makes it easier to navigate from the Google Drive home screen.

title: Right Clicking
text: Right-clicking on the file in Drive will give show your a pop-up of different sheet edit options.

title: Manual File Manipulation
text: A file can be changed by physically moving it to a new location, like you would in real life when filling information.

title: Indirectly Move
text: The file can also be moved through Drive commands, using "Move to" and navigating to the folder for the file to be placed in.
